string.text: Speciality 20-caliber shell filled with 17-6mm buckshot pellets. These shells is sure to put down any mutant or unarmored target. If the pellets meet any type of armor it can't penetrate, they are sure to knock the wind out of your target with each shot.

These homemade slugs contain barbed wire encased in a solid glass shell. While the force of the slug is very low due its composition, it will shred any unarmored target or mutant standing in your way. The glass shards and barbed wire will blend up their insides.

Zone-made slugs made with fragments of various electric-based artefacts. This anomalous round reacts chaotically with critical hit points and armored targets. When coming into contact with such areas, it summons a lightning strike, damaging anyone within a small radius of the struck target. However, this summoned lightning strike will not damage the user. Reasons of this is unknown, but some stalkers assume that it is the Zone that chooses to protect wielders of such power.
